<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script">
    <sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <abort_action>false</abort_action>
        <access>package_private</access>
        <action_delete>false</action_delete>
        <action_insert>false</action_insert>
        <action_query>false</action_query>
        <action_update>false</action_update>
        <active>true</active>
        <add_message>false</add_message>
        <advanced>true</advanced>
        <change_fields>false</change_fields>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <collection>release_project</collection>
        <condition/>
        <description/>
        <execute_function>false</execute_function>
        <filter_condition/>
        <is_rest>false</is_rest>
        <message/>
        <name>SNC Release Insert Phases</name>
        <order>100</order>
        <priority/>
        <rest_method/>
        <rest_method_text/>
        <rest_service/>
        <rest_service_text/>
        <rest_variables/>
        <role_conditions/>
        <script><![CDATA[gs.log("Release Insert Phases starting");
insertPhases(current);
gs.log("Release Insert Phases ending");


function insertPhases(current) {
  var phases = current.phases.getChoices(current.type);
  var order = 100;
  var active = true;
  for (var i = 0; i < phases.size(); i++) {
    var phase = phases.get(i);   
    var grPhase = new GlideRecord('release_phase');  
    grPhase.initialize();
    grPhase.name.setValue(phase);
    grPhase.order.setValue(order);
    order += 100;
    grPhase.release.setValue(current.sys_id);
    grPhase.planned_end_date.setValue(current.due_date);
    grPhase.priority.setValue(current.priority);
    var desc = grPhase.name.getDisplayValue() + ' phase for project ' + current.number + ' (' + current.short_description + ')';
    grPhase.short_description.setValue(desc);   
    grPhase.active.setValue(active);
    if (active == true) {
      grPhase.actual_start_date.setValue(gs.nowDateTime());  
    }
    active = false;
    grPhase.insert();     
  }
}

]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>glide.maint</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2006-05-07 08:32:22</sys_created_on>
        <sys_domain>global</sys_domain>
        <sys_domain_path/>
        <sys_id>0df9cd1d0a0a0a0a01443628846898c7</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>6</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>SNC Release Insert Phases</sys_name>
        <sys_overrides/>
        <sys_package display_value="Release Management" source="com.snc.release_management">0486f4243cb1311068bcf327dfe37f8f</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_0df9cd1d0a0a0a0a01443628846898c7</sys_update_name>

        <sys_updated_on>2009-03-11 17:58:59</sys_updated_on>
        <template/>

    </sys_script>
    <sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=0df9cd1d0a0a0a0a01443628846898c7"/>
</record_update>
